references.paper_title: 2D Human Pose Estimation: New Benchmark and State of the Art Analysis
references.reason: This paper establishes a benchmark dataset and analysis for 2D human pose estimation, providing a foundation for many subsequent works in the field.

references.paper_title: Deep High-Resolution Representation Learning for Human Pose Estimation
references.reason: This paper introduces HRNet, a high-resolution network architecture that significantly improves the accuracy of human pose estimation, particularly at high-resolution.

references.paper_title: Stacked Hourglass Networks for Human Pose Estimation
references.reason: This paper introduces the stacked hourglass network, a widely adopted architecture for human pose estimation based on heatmap regression.

references.paper_title: Simple Baselines for Human Pose Estimation and Tracking
references.reason: This paper provides simple yet effective baselines for human pose estimation, facilitating easier comparison and evaluation of new methods.

references.paper_title: CrowdPose: Efficient Crowded Scenes Pose Estimation and a New Benchmark
references.reason: This paper introduces a new benchmark dataset, CrowdPose, specifically designed for evaluating human pose estimation in crowded scenes, which is a challenging scenario for many methods.
